GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: fix null deref due to zeroed list head

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 8a2df34b5bf652566f2889d9fa321f3b398547ef, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 55dd6f93076bb82aa8911191125418dcfcbf2c9b. For more details please see the references link.
